header: It's not often we get to mention Perl books here, and this week there are two stories related to Perl books: the 4th edition of the classic Modern Perl has been published by the Pragmatic Bookshelf, and the Dancer core team are running a kickstart campaign to fund production of a Dancer book.
Perl 6 is now officially in beta!
subject: Two perl books in the news!

Test::Stream going stable
entries.author: chad_granum
entries.text: The Test-Stream distribution is the successor to Test-Simple, the distribution that contains Test::Builder, Test::More, and more. There has been a lot of discussion, experiment, and even a few heated words over the last year. But now Chad says it's moving out of the experimental phase, and explains what he means by that.
Chad talks through some of the practicalities of working with Test::Stream.
